text:
="preserve">Bernard Madrelle (27 April 1944 – 25 September 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was born in Saint-Seurin-de-Cursac, France.
From 1978 to 2007, he was a member of the National Assembly. He was also Mayor of Saint-Seurin-de-Cursac between 1983 to 1989 and for Blaye between 1989 to 2008.
Madrelle died of liver cancer in Blaye, France on 25 September 2020 at the age of 76.
